title: Mega Rich Intensive Anti-Aging Cellular Creme

The complex helps firm, tone, smooth, and clarify the look of skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and the severity of deep wrinkles for younger-looking skin. It is also rich with the antiaging benefits of lactic and malic AHAs; vitamins A, C, E; pro vitamin B5; sea algae; and botanicals. title: Rose Face Mask
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is:A cult-favorite hydrating and toning gel mask infused with real rose petals, soothing rosewater, and a “smart” algae that delivers optimum moisture.Solutions for:- Dryness- Redness- Pores If you want to know more…Fresh Rose Face Mask is a toning gel mask that drenches dull, tired skin with hydration for a healthy-looking complexion. It’s beautiful to look at, beautiful to smell, and has all these beautiful benefits. I call it ‘nature’s wonder.’ The flower yields a precious oil that helps to hydrate, soothe, and tone the skin. With today’s technology, we are able to refine the purity of the extract, making it even more effective in skincare.”Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder Research results:In vivo test: - 100% reported healthy-looking, supple skin - 93% felt their skin was moisturized, softened, smoothed, and soothed - 93% noticed a cooling and calming sensation - 90% said it nourished and visibly improved the appearance of their skin Beauty tips:- For a soft, supple canvas under makeup, start with Rose Face Mask and follow with your daily skincare ritual. - Lightly mist Fresh Rose Floral Toner on your face as a mask primer before applying Rose Face Mask. - Put this unique mask in the fridge to enhance its cooling sensation. - Use Rose Face Mask after a flight or a long day of indoor heating and air conditioning to rehydrate your skin. - The cooling formula refreshes your skin after a day in the sun.

title: Elixir Ancien
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: A luxurious face treatment that smooths the appearance of wrinkles and provides ultimate nourishment with oils hand-blended in a monastery. Blended by hand in a monastery, these natural oils absorb quickly to deliver highly precious ingredients that help smooth and protect the complexion. Meadowfoam seed oil, an emollient fatty acid, is easily absorbed by the skin to help hydrate and nourish while seabuckthorn oil is rich with moisturizing omegas 7 and 9 and protective antioxidants. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know: "I came across an ancient book in my lab in France that contained the unique formula for the world's first cold cream developed in the second century by Claudius Galenus, an influential medical scientist of the time and attending physician for gladiators, treating their wounds after battle. This cream served as the muse for this supremely nourishing collection."Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder Research results: In-vivo test: - 97% felt their skin was nourished - 87% reported more moisturized, supple skin - 84% noticed a soothing and smoothing effect

What it is formulated to do:Chia Serum is a revolutionary, multitasking serum with rare extracts of chia oil and fat-soluble essential nutrients and vitamins, scientifically formulated to leave the skin velvety-soft to the touch and visibly vibrant. This luxuriant concentrated serum is an ideal booster to any Perricone MD regimen. Whether used on its own, mixed in with your favorite moisturizer, or applied as a finishing step to makeup, Chia Serum conditions and hydrates the skin while imparting an instantly healthy, glowing complexion. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens What else you need to know:Chia seeds are one of richest vegetable sources of omega 3 fatty acids. Dr. Perricone combines chia oil with five fat-soluble nutrients and vitamins including vitamin E, vitamin A, pro-vitamin B5, vitamin C ester, and co enzyme Q10. The chia oil used in Dr. Perricone’s Chia Serum is cold-pressed, extra-virgin, and unrefined so it maintains full potency of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and other nutrients. Research results:Immediately after use: - 90% reported their skin felt more hydrated - 71% reported their skin looked more radiant and had a healthier glow After one week: - 85% reported it nourished and conditioned their skin - 83% reported it soothed their dry skin; felt more hydrated - 76% reported their skin looked naturally dewy; more supple

title: Aqua Gel Luminous Oil-Free Moisturizer
detail_text: What it is: A refreshing, aqua-rich gel-cream moisturizer that hydrates and revitalizes the skin, promoting a look of resilience and vitality. What it does: Is your skin dehydrated? Dull? Oily or combination and struggling to control sebum secretion? NARS exclusive Light Reflecting Complex™ works in synergy with Dynamic Aqua Technology, which helps to retain water in the upper layers of the skin, keeping it soft and replenished. Plumped with moisture, skin becomes supple; fine lines and wrinkles visibly soften. Wild thyme provides antioxidant protection as Japonicus root extract works to improve skin’s natural barrier, fortifying the skin against moisture loss. Beech Bud extract supports skin’s natural production of collagen while Sophora root extract inhibits the enzyme that breaks down elastin. Weightless to the touch, never sticky or filmy, it is also infused with Peony extract to help control surface oil and shine throughout the day. A soft matte finish helps bond makeup to the skin for fewer touch-ups, smoothing the way for seamless foundation and long-lasting brilliant color. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens What else you need to know: NARS Exclusive Light Reflecting Complex enhances skin’s luminosity, while Wild Thyme extract is known to be rich in protective antioxidant properties. To achieve luminous skin, it is vital to protect the skin against harsh free-radical damage. Free radicals are highly reactive chemicals produced by UVA and UVB rays, pollution, sun, and smoking that have the ability to damage the structure of all living cells, leading to premature aging. Topical antioxidants help the skin to protect itself against these harmful chemicals. Plankton extract is known for its cell metabolism benefits. To achieve luminous skin, it is also vital to boost cell energy, so skin cells are always performing at their optimal level. This product is dermatologist-tested; non-comedogenic; and free of synthetic fragrance, parabens, alcohol, and oil. Research results: A four-week 60-panel test yielded the following sensory clinical results: - 97% agreed that the product gave them a comfortable feeling - 95% agreed that the product soothed and comforted their skin - 95% agreed that the product left their skin feeling refreshed - 95% agreed that the product absorbed easily - 94% agreed that the product left their skin feeling soft - 92% agreed that the product left their skin feeling moisturized - 90% agreed that the product smoothed out the surface of their skin - 84% agreed that the product helped control excess oil during the day - 98% agreed that it was easy to apply foundation on top of this product

Free radicals are highly reactive chemicals produced by UVA and UVB rays, pollution, sun, and smoking that have the ability to damage the structure of all living cells, leading to premature aging. title: Black Pine Firming, Lifting & Antiwrinkle Eye Cream
detail_text: What it is:An intensive eye cream that instantly lifts the look of the eye area while reducing puffiness and dark circles. What it is formulated to do:This powerful eye cream is infused with the highly active and efficacious black pine extract, part of a proprietary blend containing eight unique active ingredients, five of which are patented, including Hexapeptide 11the first ever natural polypeptide and a global innovation in the beauty industry which is known to support natural collagen and elastin production. Recommended for all skin types, Black Pine Eye Cream immediately lifts while it firms, reduces under-eye puffiness, and minimizes dark circles. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know:As skin ages the connective tissue deteriorates resulting in the visible signs of aging like sagging skin and loss of natural facial contour. During two years of primary clinical research, the KORRES Research Lab in Athens, Greece discovered that powerful black pine polyphenols maintain the elasticity of the connective tissue better than all other polyphenols studied, boosting skin firmness, lifting face contour, resisting deep wrinkles, and preventing sagging. This product does not contain petrolatum, mineral oil, silicones, propylene glycol, and ethanolamines. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans, and is not tested on animals. Research results:After an 8-week self-evaluation: - 100% saw visibly firmer skin - 95% saw improved skin elasticity - 90% saw a reduction in the appearance of dark circles - 100% reported skin felt softer and smoother

What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens - Phthalates What else you need to know:Olivier Baussan, founder of L'OCCITANE, discovered the benefits of shea butter during a trip to Burkina Faso in the 80’s. He was amazed to learn that women from Burkina Faso traditionally massage shea butter on newborns to protect them against harsh environmental elements (the sun, wind, etc.) and to soothe irritations. People also apply it to soften their skin, relax their muscles, and nourish their hair. Baussan started to establish a sustainable commercial relationship starting from 1981, with women in Burkina Faso, to buy shea butter. Twenty years ago, fewer than 100 women were producing shea butter for L'OCCITANE, and now more than 15,000 are working in four different groups.

detail_text: What it is:A luxurious serum to improve the look of dark spots, even skin's texture, and deliver a radiant glow, instantly and over time. What else you need to know:A bright new flower: the Edelweiss from the Dior Garden. It is at the edge of the Swiss Mountains in a pure and untouched environment that Dior ethnobotanists have been studying the exceptional brightening power of this legendary flower, which literally means “Noble White.” A true gift from nature, it is the only flower able to blossom and preserve pure whiteness even under extreme conditions. The more extreme the conditions are, the whiter this rare flower blooms. A new treasure: the Dior Garden in Switzerland. Edelweiss is cultivated at the heart of the Valais Garden in Switzerland at an altitude of 1,100 m. In this beautiful but hostile environment, temperatures can drop until -10 degrees Celsius while UV intensity is extreme, heavily reflected by the eternal snows. All the conditions are gathered for Edelweiss to develop the finest flowers, naturally and in the greatest respect of the environment.

Kakadu plum contains both water- and fat-soluble antioxidant compounds that together may provide a more comprehensive protection against oxidative stress. Wild harvested in the remote Australian Kimberley and NW Territory, kakadu plum puts the “super” in super fruit. Ounce per ounce, kakadu plums contain on average 55 times the vitamin C of Florida oranges.* *A fresh kakadu plum contains on average 2500mg/100g WW of vitamin C vs. a Florida orange, which contains 45mg/100g WW. Based upon data calculated from Food Chemistry (Nov. 2013) and the US Department of Agriculture (March 2014). The kakadu plum included in the product has been combined with stabilized vitamin C from other sources. Note that the vitamin content of natural foods are estimates and vary depending upon conditions such as soil, temperature, and climate.

What it is formulated to do:This innovative, multiaction Trans-Foam Clay in Calming White is applied like a clay mask but transforms into a gentle foaming cleanser, removing makeup, absorbing oil, and detoxifying your skin. When splashed with water, the mineral-rich, white French clay lathers to a foam that brightens, tones, and removes dead skin cells for a fresh and healthy-looking complexion. Fine natural clay particles charged with hydrogen mineral water and other natural ingredientsincluding chamomile flower extract to calm sensitive skin and rednessdeeply cleanse pores and gently exfoliate. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Phthalates

title: Golden Krocus Ageless Saffron Elixir Serum
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A precious golden elixir infused with the immense antioxidant power of one-day fresh Greek saffron to universally correct all visible signs of aging. Solutions for:- Fine lines/wrinkles- Uneven skin tone and discoloration - Loss of firmness/elasticity If you want to know more…In the Greek town of Kozani, lush krocus flowers bloom only once per year and produce the highest quality organic saffron in the worlda potent spice more precious than gold. Korres extracts the full power of this hand-picked, one-day fresh saffron at its maximum antioxidant levels and combines it with beta-glucans, peptides, and amino acids to create this elixir that strengthens skin’s resistance to daily damage. A complex of amino acids, polysaccharides, and copper supports natural collagen production to help visibly firm and lift skin while reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Low molecular weight hyaluronic acid easily and deeply penetrates the skin to smooth, plump, and brighten. Much more than your typical serum, this universal and powerful booster repairs all visible signs of aging for all skin types and concerns. Experience a few golden drops every day for youthful-looking, glowing skin. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:It takes 70,000 krocus flowerswhich bloom only once per year for two weeksto produce just one pound of Greek saffron. Each flower is hand-picked and the three delicate red saffron stigmas are hand-separated to preserve the potent antioxidant properties of this rare and precious spice. The unused parts of the flowers are returned to soil as organic fertilizer for the following year’s harvest, making this a zero waste, sustainable operation. The elixir is 94.9 percent natural and like all Korres formulations, it is made without petrolatum, mineral oil, silicones, propylene glycol, and ethanolamines. detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Combination What it is:A detoxifying serum to boost the eyes’ youthful-looking radiance. What else you need to know: The Dior Garden's hibiscus from Burkina Faso. Dior Research carried out studies on this hibiscus flower, revealing that its delicate chalice hides under its gown of petals an extraordinary power of detoxification. Hibiscus extract has been shown to stimulate the recycling process of toxins from the cells.The Koro Garden, Burkina Faso. The Dior Garden, dedicated to the red hibiscus, is located in the heart of the Koro Ecological and Cultural Site, an area covering 20 hectares where 18 percent of Burkina Faso’s flora flourishes, representing nearly 190 plant species. This remarkable site was selected due to its distinctive geology and the richness of its soil. More than a hectare is entirely devoted to cultivating the “hibiscus sabdariffa”, or red hibiscus. Research results:In a self-evaluation on 66 women:At application:- 84% saw reduced signs of fatigue- 84% saw a luminous eye contour- 82% saw a more uniform eye contour- 80% saw more vibrance- 79% saw fresher-looking eyes- 69% saw a clarified eye contourAfter 1 month:- 95% saw a more uniform eye contour- 89% saw more vibrance- 89% saw a clarified eye contour- 88% saw fresher-looking eyes- 87% saw reduced signs of fatigue- 87% saw a luminous eye contour

detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: An effective, daily moisturizer infused with sodium hyaluronate and light-reflecting particles to impart an instant, universally flattering, lit-from-within glow. title: WHITE Brightening Lotion
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: An advanced, rejuvenating toning lotion with active ingredients to address pigmentation, boost radiance, and refine the texture of skin. Solutions for: - Dark spots and uneven skin tone - Dullness and uneven texture - Oiliness If you want to know more… Eve Lom’s WHITE Brightening Lotion helps create a visibly brighter and more youthful appearance. It’s formulated with Dermapep™, which is clinically proven to improve pigmentation and unify skin tone. A powerful tri-peptide helps renew your skin’s texture, smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while zinc PCA helps to control excess of sebum. A naturally derived microalgae extract, enriched with amino acids, encourages cell turnover to combat dull skin, while betaine, an anti-inflammatory, supports calm skin and provides optimum water balance. Fennel extract helps to revitalize your skin and licorice root extract delivers anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial, anti-irritant, and anti-oxidant benefits. Scented with rose otto oil, it leaves skin feeling conditioned, clarified, and more radiant. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know: Dermapep is clinically proven to be up to twenty times more effective at correcting pigmentation and boosting luminosity than arbutin, kocic acid, and hydroquinone, the most relied upon skin brighteners to date. For optimal results follow daily with the WHITE Advanced Brightening Serum and weekly with the WHITE Brightening Mask.

title: FRXXXTION Stick Exfoliating Cleanser
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A twist-up, three-in-one facial cleansing stick. The hypoallergenic gel stick gently sloughs away dead surface cells and polishes skin as it cleanses to fight dullness and pump up the radiance. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Phthalates What else you need to know:This product is hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested.
